definition: working woman/variant of 女紅|女红[nu:3 gong1]

sentences.english: Conclusions The areca processing could affect reproduction function of female workers.
sentences.chinese: 结论槟榔加工作业对女工生殖功能有影响。

sentences.english: Sybil quizzed her about life as a working girl.
sentences.chinese: 西比尔询问了她当女工的生活。

sentences.english: In between, women often returned to their villages.
sentences.chinese: 在这中间，女工们往往回到村子里。

sentences.english: Carmen throws a flower at him, and the girls go back to work.
sentences.chinese: 卡门将鲜花抛给贺塞，而众女工重返工作岗位。

sentences.english: Women workers are entitled to maternity leave with full pay.
sentences.chinese: 女工产假期间工资照发。

sentences.english: Such milkwoman usually walk in streets and sell milk in bottles.
sentences.chinese: 图中的牛奶女工通常都站在街边买瓶装的牛奶。

sentences.english: Working condition and environment might be one of the factors in the appearence of galactorrhea in women working in these factories.
sentences.chinese: 工作条件与环境可能与工厂女工泌乳的发生有关。

sentences.english: Co-wives are able to support each other and help with "women's work."
sentences.chinese: 妻子们之间能相互支持，能在女工上相互帮助。

sentences.english: However, noise exposure was not strongly related to dysmenorrhea and ovulatory status.
sentences.chinese: 噪声暴露对纺织女工的痛经和有无排卵影响并不明显。
哪一个洗衣女工想要手表？

sentences.english: Clare looked round upon her, seated with the others.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔扭头看去，只见她同其他的女工坐在一起。

sentences.english: The women would have their tea at six o'clock and she would be able to get away before seven.
sentences.chinese: 女工们六点钟吃茶点，她七点之前就能离开。

sentences.english: It was night-time, in the East End of London, and before him stood Margey, a little factory girl of fifteen.
sentences.chinese: 面前站着玛尔姬，一个十五岁的小女工。

sentences.english: Ground of Yang Rui hopeless fell in love with clean workingwoman of Qing Chun to set one's mind at.
sentences.chinese: 杨瑞不可救药地爱上了清纯的清洁女工安心。

sentences.english: The effect of noise exposure on dysmenorrhoea showed no significance.
sentences.chinese: 噪声暴露对纺织女工的痛经影响没有显著性意义。

sentences.english: Among 8000 workers, 3500 of them are women.
sentences.chinese: 八千工人，其中三千五百人是女工。

definition: peasant woman (in former times)/female farm worker
